author: world today news
title: Children, increasingly affected by pneumonia
text:
This year saw the most cases of pneumonia among children in the past five years. If in other summers a few children with such pathology would come to the hospital, now their number has increased by 30 percent. Doctors are warning that hospitals are full, and this is because many children are returning from holidays after being exposed to various viruses that are dangerous for immunity.
Ten days ago, Viorica Spânu with her daughter Patricia took the bus from Milan to return to the Republic of Moldova. The next day, Patricia had a fever, and as soon as they reached the Râscani area, they went to the doctor. For several days, mother and daughter were admitted to the hospital, as the teenager was diagnosed with pneumonia.
For many children, the first day was the most difficult, with a very high fever.
Doctors say that the little ones are the most vulnerable to pneumonia, especially children from one to eight years old.
RODICA OVCEARENCO, head, intensive care, Municipal Children’s Hospital number 1: “Even if it is summer and the children are not in groups now, but the children with their parents are resting abroad, they have contact with children from other regions, and this is probably the reason why many viruses and bacteria are known.”
ALIONA ROTARI, director, Municipal Children’s Hospital No. 1: “Pneumonia is a real pathology and when a doctor’s help is needed, I would ask parents not to hesitate to call 112. It is true that in the five years we have not registered a greater number of patients were sent to the emergency department. In the last period we have more serious and severe pneumonia than in previous years.”
Experts recommend parents to contact the family doctor about the first symptoms of the child’s illness and not to use self-medication. At the same time, doctors are urging parents to vaccinate their children against the flu.
2024-08-15 17:14:00
#Children #increasingly #affected #pneumonia

author: Brad Bugger For the Journal
title: ISU men's and women's basketball teams score wins against Vandals
text:
The beginning wasn’t pretty, and the ending was downright scary, but there was enough good stuff in between to allow the Idaho State men’s basketball team to escape with a 64-59 win over instate rival Idaho at Reed Gym Thursday night.
“Honestly, I didn’t feel good about our first four minutes and our last four minutes,” said ISU Coach Ryan Looney, “but everything else in between there was pretty good.”
The Bengals played poor defense and got in early foul trouble early in the contest, allowing the Vandals to build a 27-20 lead with 4:30 to in the half. ISU had three players, all of whom play the small forward position, in foul trouble with two fouls each n the period, the Vandals were a perfect seven for seven from the foul line, and Looney got hit with a technical foul for protesting too vigorously.
Yet ISU was able to go on an 8-3 run to close the halftime margin to 30-28, and re-establish some footing heading into the second period.
“We had some big-time foul trouble, especially early in the game,” said Looney, noting that Isaiah Griffin, Trent Johnson and Briggs Ranstrom all had two fouls in the first half. “We just literally had to get through some minutes to get to halftime, so we could get our regular lineup back on the floor.”
Once they did, the Bengals went on a 14-0 run in the second half to build as much as a 17-point lead with 5:42 to play in the game. Maleek Arington was dispensing his usual magic at point guard, center Brayden Parker got hot at the free throw line, and Miguel Tomley and Kiree Huie joined the offensive parade.
“At the end of the day, Maleek Arington is becoming a really good point guard,” said Looney, after the sophomore from Auburn, Wash. finished the night with 14 points, six rebounds, four assists and no turnovers while playing all 40 minutes. “We have nine turnovers in the last 80 minutes of basketball, and a lot of that has to do with him.
“And I think everyone in our program has confidence that Maleek can guard the other team’s best player every team we play as well,” Looney added. “Those two things are giving us a chance in every game we play now.”
Unfortunately, the Bengals reverted to sloppy late-game habits that allowed the Vandals to make the game much closer than it needed to be. One play in particular was disconcerting. With 23 seconds left and ISU up 62-54, the Bengals inbounded the ball against pressure, getting the ball in the front court to Trent Johnson. Instead of backing the ball out and waiting to get fouled, however, Johnson tried to make a spectacular dunk. He missed and came crashing down, clutching his knee at the end of the play. He later hobbled off the court at the end of the game, limping but under his own power.
“That’s one of the mistakes we made at the end of the game,” Looney said. “We executed an inbounds play against pressure perfectly, we just needed to pull it out, get fouled, make some free throws and the
game would have been over right there. And then shortly after that, we blew a coverage on defense and gave them a wide-open three-pointer. Those two plays make the game a lot closer than it should have been.”
But the Bengals managed to hang on to claim their seventh straight win against the Vandals. Coupled with the ISU’s women’s win in Moscow Thursday night, it guaranteed that the King Spud Trophy, which goes to the school that wins the most men’s and women’s games in the ISU-Idaho rivalry each season, will remain in Pocatello. Since the Bengals won it last year, the worst they can do is split the four-game set this year, meaning the trophy will stay in Pocatello for another year.
The Bengals had three players beside Arington score in double figures, led by Parker with 18, including 10 of 13 from the foul line. He added eight rebounds, an assist, a steal, three blocked shots and did not commit a turnover. Huie had 12 points, four rebounds and three blocks, and Tomley had 12 points.
Guard Quinn Denker led Idaho with 14 points, all in the second half, forward Tyler Linhardt added 13 and Julius Mims 12.
The Bengals improved to 2-3 in conference play, 7-11 overall, while Idaho fell to 1-3 in the league, 7-10 overall. ISU hosts defending league champion Eastern Washington, who beat Weber State in Ogden, 80-78 Thursday night, at 6 p.m. Saturday in Reed Gym.
Women’s Basketball: Idaho State 61, Idaho 56
The Idaho State women won their third Big Sky Conference game in a row, and their first on the road with a rivalry win in Moscow Thursday night.
The Bengals put four players in double figure scoring, led by true freshman forward Piper Carlson and guard Maria Dias, who both had 12 points off the bench. Starters Tasia Jordan and Nicka Lokica had 10 points apiece, with Jordan adding seven rebounds and Lokica five rebounds, two blocks and two steals.
“The game lived up to how a rivalry game should be,” said ISU Coach Seton Sobolewski. “Hard fought on both ends.”
Idaho State led 19-13 at the end of one quarter, 34-28 at half and 52-44 at the end of three periods. The Vandals outscored ISU 12-9 in the final quarter, as ISU went cold, hitting just two of ten shots in the final quarter, to narrow the final margin.
Carlson has put together back-to-back solid performances off the bench, having scored 13 points and not missing a shot in ISU’s win over Sacramento State on Saturday. She has totaled 25 points on 11 of 13 shooting and seven steals in the last two games.
“Piper has made huge strides the last two games,” Sobolewski said. “So fun to watch her develop.”
The Bengals played without forward Halle Wright, who fell ill on the trip. She practiced Wednesday night, but then got sick on game day. It’s unknown if she’ll be available for ISU’s game at Eastern Washington Saturday afternoon. Tip-off is 3 p.m. MT.
The Bengals hit five of ten three-pointers, one of their better efforts from beyond the arc on the season, including two of four by Lokica, who hit four of six from distance in the win Saturday over Sac State. ISU also had only 13 turnovers on the night, one of their better efforts in that category.
Sarah Brans led Idaho with 16 points, including four three-pointers, and Asha Phillips added 12 points. The Vandals outrebounded ISU, 41-35.
With the win, ISU moves to 3-2 in the Big Sky, 7-9 overall. Idaho falls to 2-2 in league, 9-7 overall.

author: 电玩墨客 2024年音乐动态生成游戏大全震撼发布！探索排行榜前十的创新之作，融合音符与乐趣的巅峰对决。从 节奏大师
title: 音乐动态生成游戏大全 2024音乐动态生成游戏排行榜前十_游戏单机游戏-中关村在线
text: 2024年音乐动态生成游戏大全震撼发布！探索排行榜前十的创新之作，融合音符与乐趣的巅峰对决。从 节奏大师 到创意作曲，这不仅是游戏热爱者的新纪元，更是音乐与科技交汇的艺术盛宴。一窥究竟，体验视听狂欢的极致之旅！ 1 音乐战机 2 音乐战机2是Dylan Fitterer制作发行的音乐游戏。其画面空间酷炫，玩家能选喜欢的音乐。游戏里玩家可高空跳跃，玩出绝技能得高分。它包含多种模式，玩家可按需选择，这些特点使其深受玩家喜爱。 2 TheWaveVR Beta 　　《TheWaveVR Beta》是一款由TheWaveVR制作并发行的VR模拟游戏。 3 Songs for a Hero - Definitive Edition Songs for a Hero - Definitive Edition是由Dumativa Creative Studio与Castro Brothers制作发行的动作冒险游戏。 4 谜音幻阵 Soundodger+是一款融合子弹地狱与节奏游戏元素的 软件 。在游戏中，玩家要在子弹飞舞的场景下，依据节奏进行操作。它将紧张刺激的躲避子弹玩法和富有韵律的节奏挑战相结合，玩家需要精准把握节奏来躲避子弹的攻击，考验玩家的反应速度与节奏感。游戏画面华丽，这种独特的玩法组合为玩家带来别具一格的游戏体验。 5 vrAMP vrAMP是Oriku Inc制作发行的VR音乐游戏。玩家借助VR设备，置身于充满烟尘、火花和灯光的环境里，感受绚丽的音乐世界。 6 节奏地牢 节奏地牢是一款独特的僵尸游戏。通常僵尸类游戏玩法较单调，多为从僵尸包围中逃脱或击败僵尸，玩久易乏味。而该游戏将动作冒险与音乐玩法相结合，使打僵尸的过程更具动感，为玩家带来不一样的游戏体验。 7 逃脱旋律 逃脱旋律是一款结合音乐元素的动作游戏。它具备读取玩家本地音乐库的功能，玩家可从中挑选喜爱的音乐。在游戏里，玩家能伴着所选音乐尽情跳跃。 8 北极之光 北极之光为休闲益智游戏，玩家扮演一个光点，游戏目标是不被击中。玩家移动速度不快，主要通过利用入射波的变化引导自身移动，关键在于更好地引导对手，使其自我毁灭。 9 Intralism Intralism是KHB - Soft制作发行的动作冒险游戏，关于其更具体的功能特色等详情未给出更多信息，仅能确定其所属的游戏类型为动作冒险类，由特定的制作和发行方打造。 10 子弹节拍 子弹节拍是一款动作射击游戏。游戏中所有关卡均与音乐同步，射击也不例外。玩家可上传自己的曲目，体验根据曲目实验性生成的关卡。游戏里保持连击能够增强实力。 以上是关于2024音乐动态生成游戏精选排行榜前十名的详细阐述。每一款作品均蕴含独特魅力和游戏机制，我们深信您会在其中发现符合个人喜好的那一部。若对某款游戏抱有更深入的兴趣或寻求额外信息，只需点击即可 下载 亲身体验。 本文属于原创文章，如若转载，请注明来源： 音乐动态生成游戏大全 2024音乐动态生成游戏排行榜前十 https://game.zol.com.cn/966/9667804.html
topics: Arts, Culture and Entertainment->arts and entertainment

author: @Metro_PR
title: Famosa actriz de Televisa desahuciada por el cáncer sufre preinfarto: "Oren por mí"
text:
Un reconocida actriz que ha participado en producciones tanto de Televisa, como de TV Azteca y hasta de Netflix dio a conocer a través de sus redes sociales que sufrió un preinfarto, por lo que se internó en el hospital. Cabe destacar que esta estrella de televisión se encuentra desahuciada por el cáncer de columna que padece.
Renata el Castillo reveló en febrero de 2023 que fue diagnosticada con un tumor en la columna. De esta manera, se realizó una cirugía para eliminar el tumor que costó 250 mil pesos, dinero que consiguió gracias a las donaciones de sus colegas del medio artístico y sus amigos cercanos.
PUBLICIDAD
No obstante, en julio de 2024 confesó que el tratamiento y las radioterapias que estaba recibiendo no funcionaron, por lo que el cáncer se expandió a otras áreas y ya no hay nada qué hacer al respecto. Cabe destacar que la enfermedad de la actriz de ‘Como dice el dicho’ se derivó de un cáncer cervicouterino que no fue diagnosticado a tiempo, ya que no se hizo el papanicolau durante el año que duró la pandemia por Covid-19.
¿Qué le pasó a Renata del Castillo, actriz de Televisa?
A través de sus historias de Instagram la actriz de ‘Control Z’ reveló que llegó en al hospital por un intenso dolor: “Estoy en el hospital en urgencias porque traigo un dolor desde ayer súper intenso en los omóplatos y ya se pasó a mi brazo”.
“La oncóloga me dijo hace rato que me viniera ya por la inmunoterapia, que por fin la recibí el martes, puede ser una trombosis porque se hacen coágulos por todos los medicamentos que me ponen”, agregó.
De esta manera, mencionó haber sufrido un preinfarto, por lo que pidió a sus seguidores que oraran por ella: “Tuve un preinfarto, así que me van a hacer todos los análisis pidiéndole a Dios que todo salga bien, oren por mí y aquí estamos, internados en el hospital”.

author: Hope Lompe
title: Fishing communities welcome B.C. intention to reform licensing and quotas | Canada's National Observer: Climate News
text:
Fishing communities, harvesters and advocates are welcoming British Columbia’s intention to work with the federal government to reform the purchase system for fish licences and quotas for B.C.'s commercial fishing industry.
As part of the Coastal Marine Strategy unveiled last week, the province says it’s moving toward an owner-operator system for quota and licences. Under the new system, licence and quota holders would also need to be active fish harvesters — something advocacy groups and First Nations have been requesting for years.
Get daily news from Canada's National Observer Email *
The current individual transferable quotas (ITQ) system allows corporations and foreign investors with deep pockets to buy the right to catch fish for the highest price, making it increasingly difficult for individual harvesters, First Nations and generational fishing families to stay in the industry.
A transition to an owner-operator system would aim to eliminate the ability of a few giants to stake a majority claim on B.C.'s fishing grounds. One company alone, Jim Pattison’s Canfisco, owns double-digit percentages of some fish quotas, worth tens of millions of dollars.
An owner-operator system is not a novel concept in the country. Atlantic Canada has had one in place for years, and as a result, has lower costs compared to B.C.
Fishing community welcomes B.C. intention to move toward an owner-operator system
B.C. Premier David Eby sent a letter to Prime Minister Justin Trudeau in May advocating for a policy change, as the decision to bring B.C. in line with the East Coast is ultimately in the hands of the federal government. However, there is no word yet on when B.C. fishers can expect a decision.
“The province stepping in and pressuring the federal government for change is incredibly impactful,” wrote James Lawson, president of the United Fisherman & Allied Workers Union in a statement.
“The province is ultimately responsible for labour and recognize that if policies don’t change they may have to deal with the fallout from a skilled labour shortage very soon.”
This issue in the Pacific is akin to the housing crisis, says Sonia Strobel, co-founder and CEO of Skipper Otto , a Vancouver-based, community-supported fishery that works with 45 fishing families to sell wild-caught seafood directly to consumers.
“Real estate is a really good parallel because we've been well aware for many years that when we don't have things in place… what happens is purchasing homes [or] condos for investment drives up the price of properties,” she says. “And then that really pushes local people out of the market [and] makes it next to impossible for young people to buy their first home.”
Sonia is seeing the same thing happen with fishing families and First Nations being pushed out of the industry.
In 2021, the Haida and eight coastal First Nations were able to purchase licences and quotas from willing third-party licence-holders, thanks to an agreement between nations and the federal government in an effort to address the dwindling number of Indigenous community members who were able to make a living fishing in their traditional waters.
“I've watched the industry kind of disappear from this area,” says Trevor Russ, director of policy and programs for Coastal First Nations . “A lot of the marine resources that are commercially harvested and go to market are still harvested around Haida Gwaii but [there’s] very little commercial fishery participation from our communities here.”
Licences and quotas can be leased by the owner, but just like housing rentals, as the price of a licence goes up, so does the cost to lease, leaving many fishers in a position where they need to work extraordinarily hard not fall into the red, which has become increasingly common.
“There's not going to be a next generation unless they can go in on an owner-operator system,” says Shaun Strobel, Sonia’s husband and Skipper Otto’s lead fisher.
“I know people that have leased quota from a company… and by the time they’ve fixed their boat and got ready to go, the price of the fish had dropped to the point that they had to go and fish at a loss.”
Emily Orr, executive director for the T Buck Suzuki Foundation , grew up in a fishing family and fished for 12 years under her father’s licence, and skippered the boat when he semi-retired. Despite her years of experience, she wasn't in a position to take on the financial risk of about $700,000 for both the vessel and licence.
Shaun was also unable to buy his father's vessel and licences due to cost constraints. Instead, he transitioned to gillnetting, which is not part of the same ITQ system.
Tasha Sutcliffe, senior fisheries advisor with Ecotrust Canada , says anecdotes like this illustrate how difficult it is to compete in the market under the current system, and that buying a licence and quota in most fisheries is completely out of reach for the average fish harvester.
Ecotrust Canada has been working and advocating for a policy shift to an owner-operator system in B.C. since before Sutcliffe started working there in 2007. Over the years, she says the problem has only gotten worse, and there are risks in switching to an owner-operator system without a lot of input from fishers and their communities.
A successful owner-operator roll-out would identify fisheries where the system would make the most sense. She would also like to see a “fleet separation” policy that would prevent anyone from owning fish quota if they are not themselves fishing.
Sonia is optimistic the Coastal Marine Strategy recognizes the need for the government to play a role in putting infrastructure in place to encourage thriving fisheries. It represents a move away from a corporate focus, but it needs to be a plan tailored for B.C.
“You can't simply cut and paste Atlantic province policies in British Columbia and hope that we'll get the same results,” Sonia says.

author: Canaltech
title: Destaque da NASA: galáxia brilhante é a foto astronômica do dia
text:
A galáxia NGC 253 brilha na foto destacada pela
NASA
nesta quinta-feira (15). Alguns a chamam de Galáxia da Moeda de Prata devido à aparência que tem quando é observada com pequenos telescópios
; enquanto isso, outros a conhecem como Galáxia do Escultor.
-
Galáxia quase invisível desafia modelo mais aceito de matéria escura
-
O que é uma galáxia e quais são os tipos que já conhecemos?
Foi em 1783 que Caroline Herschel, matemática e astrônoma, descobriu a galáxia. Localizada nos limites da constelação do Escultor, NGC 253 fica a cerca de 10 milhões de anos-luz de nós e se estende por quase 70 mil anos-luz. As dimensões são impressionantes, mas há galáxias espirais ainda maiores — é o caso de NGC 6872, que mede incríveis 522 mil anos-luz.
Ela é o maior membro do Grupo de Galáxias do Escultor, o mais próximo do Grupo Local. Trata-se do nosso grupo galáctico, no qual a Via Láctea e Andrômeda são os membros mais massivos e, por isso, dominantes.
-
CT no Flipboard
: você já pode assinar gratuitamente as revistas Canaltech no Flipboard do iOS e Android e acompanhar todas as notícias em seu agregador de notícias favorito.
-
Na foto, NGC 253 aparece com sua estrutura espiral repleta de faixas de poeira — algumas, inclusive, parecem sair do seu disco galáctico ocupado por regiões de formação estelar e estrelas jovens. Ainda, NGC 253 é uma forte emissora de raios X e gama, provavelmente vindos de
buracos negros
massivos.
Galáxias espirais
Como a foto mostra, NGC 253 é uma galáxia do tipo espiral, categoria que inclui a Via Láctea e a maioria das galáxias conhecidas. A maior parte delas é formada por um bojo central cercado por um disco estelar achatado e em rotação.
O bojo é o lar e estrelas mais antigas e escuras, que orbitam o buraco negro supermassivo da galáxia. Cerca de 70% daquelas do tipo espiral têm estrelas organizadas em uma espécie de barra partindo do centro galáctico.
Ainda não se sabe exatamente como os braços espirais destas galáxias foram formados, mas uma possibilidade é que tenham nascido do movimento de ondas pelo disco externo delas, ou talvez por
encontros com outras galáxias
. Conforme evoluem, a tendência é que as galáxias espirais eventualmente se tornem elípticas.
Leia a matéria no
Canaltech
.

author: Glenn Pitcher
title: Bathroom Habits That New Yorkers Say Turn Them Off - NewsBreak
text:
By Glenn Pitcher ,
13 hours ago It is an aspect of love that isn’t very glamorous and isn't talked about much but it is something every couple needs to know about. I am talking about bathroom hygiene. A recent survey by QS Supplies got down and dirty (so to speak) with 1,000 Americans to see how bathroom habits impact their love lives. Here are some things they learned that might make you chuckle, cringe, or maybe do a little bit of both. Read full article

author: La Gaceta
title: La insólita frase de la ministra de Deportes francesa sobre el escándalo en Argentina-Marruecos: “Una travesura”
text: La polémica por el escándalo ocurrido en el partido entre Argentina y Marruecos por los Juegos Olímpicos sigue escalando. AFA reclamó ante FIFA, que ya inició una investigación. Pero para la ministra de Deportes de Francia, Amélie Oudéa-Castéra, el episodio no fue tan dramático. “Hubo una pequeña intrusión que no debería haber ocurrido, pero que fue bastante bondadosa por parte de los seguidores marroquíes. Luego se entrelazó con un largo tiempo de descuento en el que hubo un poco de dilación en cuanto al arbitraje”, sostuvo Oudéa-Castéra, en una entrevista. Además, garantizó que nada similar volverá a ocurrir, y que el duelo entre Ucrania y Marruecos del próximo sábado, en el mismo estadio, se llevará adelante con total tranquilidad. “Se llevó a cabo una reunión entre el Comité Olímpico Internacional y la FIFA, todo volverá a la normalidad. Todo será perfecto en el partido del próximo sábado entre Ucrania y Marruecos. Estoy comprometida con esto”, aseguró. Oudéa-Castéra ya había tenido palabras polémicas en relación a Argentina al hablar de los festejos tras ganar el Mundial de Qatar. “HUbo un contraste muy fuerte entre los (jugadores) franceses, que perdieron con elegancia, y los comportamientos fuera de lugar y a veces muy desagradables de los argentinos”, había dicho en ese momento, tratando de “penosos”, “indignos” y “vulgares”. La FIFA anunció que hará una investigación por lo sucedido entre la Sub-23 y Marruecos, en los Juegos Olímpicos La FIFA anunció este jueves que comenzará una investigación para evaluar posibles violaciones de las normas después de los graves incidentes ocurridos el miércoles durante el partido entre Argentina y Marruecos en el torneo de fútbol de los Juegos Olímpicos de París 2024. "La Comisión Disciplinaria de la FIFA ha decidido, en virtud del artículo 36 del Código Disciplinario de la FIFA, nombrar a un experto en integridad para que preste su ayuda en investigaciones sobre posibles contravenciones de la reglamentación de la FIFA, tras los incidentes acaecidos durante el partido entre las selecciones de Argentina y Marruecos disputado el 24 de julio de 2024 en el Estadio Geoffroy-Guichard de Saint-Etienne (Francia), correspondiente a la fase de grupos del Torneo Olímpico de Fútbol Masculino París 2024. La FIFA publicará más información sobre el resultado de dichas investigaciones a su debido tiempo", se puede leer en el comunicado de la entidad presidida por Gianni Infantino en su página oficial. La FIFA decidió proceder con la queja presentada por la AFA, (respaldada por el COA), tras la derrota de Argentina contra Marruecos en su debut en los Juegos Olímpicos. Claudio Tapia y su equipo buscan que se les otorgue la victoria debido a los disturbios causados por los hinchas marroquíes. El artículo 36 del Código Disciplinario determina que "la secretaría podrá nombrar a un experto en integridad para que preste su ayuda en investigaciones sobre posibles contravenciones de la reglamentación de la FIFA cuando sea necesario". En su inciso 2 indica que "el experto en integridad podrá solicitar la apertura de procedimientos disciplinarios y proponer la imposición de medidas disciplinarias a federaciones miembro, clubes y particulares". Además, también aclara: "El experto en integridad deberá ser imparcial en todo momento y cumplir con los requisitos de independencia definidos en el Reglamento de gobernanza de la FIFA. Los requisitos y condiciones de su nombramiento, así como de su cargo, se fijarán conforme a la circular al respecto".

author: كتب محمود طه حسين ومرام محمد ـ تصوير خالد كامل
title: طلبة الثانوية العامة يشتكون من صعوبة امتحان الفيزياء: مستوى الأفكار بالأسئلة الاختيارية عالٍ ويحتاج وقت إضافى.. فرحة بالشعبة الأدبية لسهولة اختبار التاريخ.. الأسئلة مباشرة.. والتعليم تتخذ إجراءات ضد المخالفين - اليوم السابع
text:
في ثان محطات المواد المضافة للمجموع أدى طلاب الثانوية العامة، امتحان مادتى الفيزياء والتاريخ، وشكا طلاب الثانوية العامة الشعبة العلمية من صعوبة أسئلة امتحان مادة الفيزياء ، حيث أكد الطلاب على أن الامتحان تضمن أفكارا كثيرة ومرتفعة تفوق مستويات الطلاب، كما أن الأسئلة تحتاج لوقت إضافى، موضحين أن الأسئلة ذات الدرجة الواحد سهلة، أما الأسئلة المخصص لها درجتين كانت صعب أما الأسئلة المقالية سهلة .
وأضاف الطلاب أن معظم الأسئلة غير مباشرة وتحتاج لجهد وتفكير، ووقت إضافى، فيما أكد طلاب الشعبة الأدبية سهولة امتحان التاريخ، حيث جاءت الأسئلة سهلة ومباشرة وفى مستوى الطالب المتوسط والأسئلة من النماذج الاسترشادية وكتيب المفاهيم.
وشهدت لجان الامتحانات إجراء تفتيش للطلاب أثناء دخولهم اللجان الامتحانية للتأكد من عدم وجود أي وسائل غش مع الطلاب في إطار التصدي للغش، كما تابعت غرفة عمليات الوزارة وصول الأسئلة في مواعيدها والتأكيد على رؤساء اللجان بالحفاظ على وقت الامتحان للطلاب
وتابعت وزارة التربية والتعليم والتعليم الفني سير امتحانات شهادة الثانوية العامة للعام الدراسي 2024 / 2025، من خلال غرفة العمليات المركزية التي تعمل بشكل متواصل بالتنسيق مع المديريات التعليمية على مستوى الجمهورية، حيث شهدت لجان الامتحانات حالة من الالتزام والانضباط، في ظل الجهود المكثفة التي تبذلها الوزارة لضمان انتظام الامتحانات وسيرها في بيئة آمنة ومنظمة.
وشهدت الامتحانات تصوير الأسئلة ونشرها على صفحات الغش الإلكترونى بعد بدء لجان الامتحانات، فيما اتخذت وزارة التربية والتعليم الإجراءات القانونية ضد المخالفات التي تم رصدها.
وحرص محمد عبد اللطيف وزير التربية والتعليم والتعليم الفني على متابعة الامتحانات من خلال غرفة العمليات المركزية بالوزارة، للاطمئنان على تطبيق جميع الإجراءات والتعليمات المتعلقة بمنظومة الامتحانات؛ وذلك لضمان سير امتحانات الثانوية العامة بشكل منضبط، كما حرص الوزير عقب انتهاء الامتحان، على الإشادة بجميع القائمين على العملية الامتحانية، وعلى جهودهم الملموسة، التي انعكست بشكل واضح في انضباط اللجان وتنفيذ التعليمات الصادرة بدقة والتزام، مؤكدًا أن الوزارة ستواصل المتابعة المستمرة والدعم الكامل لضمان إتمام الامتحانات بنجاح وفي أفضل صورة ممكنة.
وأشاد الوزير إلى الالتزام الحاسم بإجراءات التفتيش قبل دخول الطلاب إلى اللجان، وعدم السماح بأي تأخير في توزيع أوراق الأسئلة، كما تابع الوزير محمد عبد اللطيف، سير امتحانات الثانوية العامة، وذلك عبر شبكة متكاملة من التواصل المباشر مع غرف العمليات بالمحافظات، وكاميرات المراقبة التي تم تفعيلها داخل اللجان، بما يضمن رصد الأحداث لحظيًا، وسير العملية الامتحانية بانضباط في أجواء آمنة وشفافة بجميع أنحاء الجمهورية.
وشدد خالد عبد الحكم رئيس عام امتحانات الثانوية العامة ورئيس الإدارة المركزية لشؤون المديريات التعليمية على رؤساء اللجان بتنظيم دخول الطلاب إلى اللجان بداية من الساعة الثامنة والنصف صباحا، للانتهاء من إجراءات التفتيش قبل بدء الامتحان، وعدم السماح بأي تأخير في توزيع أوراق الإجابة بحيث يتم توزيعها فى تمام الساعة التاسعة إلا عشر دقائق، لإتاحة الوقت لكتابة الطالب البيانات، ومراجعتها، وتوزيع أوراق الأسئلة فى تمام الساعة التاسعة دون تأخير.
كما وجه رئيس عام امتحانات الثانوية العامة مديرى المديريات، بالتأكيد على رؤساء اللجان بضرورة الدقة في توزيع كراسات الأسئلة والإجابة داخل اللجان، وضرورة الفصل فى مادة الفيزياء بين أوراق الفيزياء باللغة العربية وأوراق الفيزياء باللغة الانجليزية، ومطابقة كراسة الأسئلة مع ورقة الإجابة الخاصة بالمادة التي يؤدي الطالب الامتحان بها، لضمان سير العملية الامتحانية بانضباط.
وشهدت لجان الامتحانات اليوم أجواءً من الانضباط التام على مستوى الجمهورية، نتيجة للتنسيق الكامل بين وزارة التربية والتعليم والمحافظات والجهات المعنية لضمان انتظام العملية الامتحانية، إلى جانب التعاون الوثيق مع وزارة الداخلية لتأمين محيط اللجان وتوفير المناخ الملائم للطلاب لأداء الامتحانات في بيئة آمنة ومستقرة.
